data.name: SHOWMAKER Hackadoll No.1
data.detailed_description:
"Hacka Doll No.1" from the "Hacka Doll" news app joins SHOWMAKER!

Making SHOWs will surely be a breeze with her on your side!?

"Hacka Doll No.1" from the news application, "Hacka Doll", joins SHOWMAKER!

～What is Hacka Doll～
Specializing in genres such as anime, manga, games, light novels, voice actors, and cosplay, the Hacka Doll service delivers news according to the user's preferences.
Exceeding over 2 million downloads on the mobile platform, while offering a browser version for PCs as well. The three Hacka Dolls, "Hacka Doll No.1", "Hacka Doll No.2", and "Hacka Doll No.3", are expanding their universe to other media such as manga, anime, and as a Virtual Youtuber.

～Hacka Doll No.1～
Navigator of the Hacka Doll news application.
Takes the role of "Personal entertainment AI" seriously.

Visit the Hacka Doll Official Website here! (Japanese)
https://hackadoll.com/

Motions include full and partial patterns of Miss Monochrome's choreography for these following songs:

・「Step By Step!」
・「Watashidake no Monogatari」
・「Kimi to Boku」
・「ONE WEEK」
・「Candy Parade」

Note:
    Additional motions may be added at a later date.

data.short_description: "Hacka Doll No.1" from the "Hacka Doll" news app joins SHOWMAKER!Making SHOWs will surely be a breeze with her on your side!?"Hacka Doll No.1" from the news application, "Hacka Doll", joins SHOWMAKER!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
